body: My profile icon is now just a blank white thing, how do I change it back to my actual minecraft skin?
body_tagged: My profile icon is now just a blank white thing, how do I change it back to my actual minecraft skin?
title: What happened to my profile head?

replies.body: Did you change your skin?
replies.body_tagged: Did you change your skin?

replies.body: If your skin head is fully black or white, it should show that. Is your skin like that?
replies.body_tagged: If your skin head is fully black or white, it should show that. Is your skin like that?

replies.body: I changed my skin but its not balc and white, I basically edited the mouth
replies.body_tagged: I changed my skin but its not balc and white, I basically edited the mouth

replies.body: Change your skin back to the default one, then change it again the the skin of your choice.
replies.body_tagged: Change your skin back to the default one, then change it again the the skin of your choice.

replies.body: You mean Steve skin?
replies.body_tagged: You mean Steve skin?

replies.body:
Yes, that is the default skin.
This is basically going to "refresh" your skin, if it is glitched.
replies.body_tagged:
Yes, that is the default skin.
This is basically going to "refresh" your skin, if it is glitched.

replies.body: K, thanks I'll try that
replies.body_tagged: K, thanks I'll try that

replies.body:
Try this skin:
http://s29.postimg.org/n1cgzmj6r/fixedskin.png
I think this is happening because the background of your skin is white.
replies.body_tagged:
Try this skin:
http://s29.postimg.org/n1cgzmj6r/fixedskin.png

replies.body: I guess my profile pic has been compromised :D
replies.body_tagged: I guess my profile pic has been compromised :D

replies.body: If you edited your pic in paint or something like that your background will be white or something, it also takes awhile for the picture to update, it is not instant.
replies.body_tagged: If you edited your pic in paint or something like that your background will be white or something, it also takes awhile for the picture to update, it is not instant.
